short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some filters to www.stadssalg.no, enabling you to filter items based on bids, item age and location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds some filtering-options to the auction-site of www.stadssalg.no, enabling you to filter items based on their bids, age and location.
This is done by loading all items on a single page. This may impact the initial loading time of the website if a category with a lot of items is selected.
